abstract: Offerpal Media, which puts advertising and other offers inside online games, announced $15 million in additional funding.
snippet: Offerpal Media, which puts advertising and other offers inside online games, announced $15 million in additional funding.
lead_paragraph: For most casual gamers on social networking sites like Facebook, MySpace and Bebo, tricking out their avatars is almost more fun than playing the game.

headline.main: Offerpal Media Raises $15 Million to Peddle In-Game Ads
